subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jeff Adrien had 16 points and 11 rebounds to lead No. 12 Connecticut past Coppin State, 84-41, last night in Hartford, extending the Huskies’ home winning streak to 30 games.
snippet: Jeff Adrien had 16 points and 11 rebounds to lead No. 12 Connecticut past Coppin State, 84-41, last night in Hartford, extending the Huskies’ home winning streak to 30 games.
